scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run render && node-sass --source-map true --source-map-contents true styles/styles.scss built/styles/styles.css && cleancss --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output built/styles/styles.min.css built/styles/styles.css && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p built/assets/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r assets/ built/
